description: Problem Description: A Counter object is being used to keep track of the number of iterations of a loop. However, when the loop reaches the end of its sequence, a StopIteration error is raised, preventing the Counter from accurately tracking the number of iterations.
code:
import collections

# Create a list of words
words = ["The", "quick", "brown", "fox", "jumped", "over", "the", "lazy", "dog"]

# Create a Counter object
cnt = collections.Counter(words
